name: Chef Don'Gian
description:
Randomly-generated dungeon crawler made in 7 days for the VimJam.
You play as Chef Don'Gian, a lovely man who loves to cook! Your goal is to fulfill recipes with your robot companion! To do so, you must seek out ingredients scattered throughout your mysterious kitchen!
Quickly traverse the dungeons, keeping an eye out for ingredients you need to fulfill your orders!
There are 3 difficulties; The came gets more complex by adding more advanced recipes, more recipes needed to win, and more area to strategically cover!
The game support keyboard and controller. (CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED)

Common functions:
Pan Attack: A slow attack which does very little damage, but staggers enemies for a short period of time
Spoon Attack: A quick attack which does a lot of damage! The most efficient way to harvest resources
Deliver Meals: When you have enough ingredients to fulfill tickets, you may send your robot back to the restaurant. Be careful! It takes time for him to get there and come back!
Map: Allows you to see which rooms you've visited and which resources are in each of them
